```js
import { createWebHashHistory, createRouter } from 'vue-router'
import Catalog from '../views/Catalog.vue'
const routes = [
  { path:'/', component: Catalog },
]
const router = createRouter({
  history: createWebHashHistory(),
  routes,
})
export default router
```
